name: Wheelchair Zombie Survivor
description:
Wheelchair Zombie Survivor is a horror survival game where you must survive as long as possible against hordes of endless zombies. Upgrade your wheelchair with new weapons to defend yourself against the zombie hordes and see how long you can survive.

Controls

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Click on the upgrades to purchase them
  • Escape or P to pause/unpause
  • Press T to show/hide stats

There's also a Windows build you can download below.
